name: Google Pixel 9 Pro XL 6.8
longDescription:
Display	6.8-inch OLED (1344 x 2992)
Refresh rate	1 - 120Hz

Rear cameras	50MP wide (f/1.68), 48MP ultrawide (f/1.7), 48MP 5x telephoto (f/2.8)
Front camera	42MP selfie (f/2.2)

Chipset:	Google Tensor G4
Titan M2 security coprocessor

RAM	16GB
Storage	256GB

Battery	5,060 mAh (minimum 4,942 mAh)

Software	Android 14

Size	6 x 2.8 x 0.3 inches (152.8 x 72 x 8.5 mm)

name: Beats Studio Buds
longDescription:
Beats Studio Buds TWS earphones with charging case delivers studio-quality sound
- ANC technology controls the unwanted noise by blocking background sounds
- Transparency mode to be aware of your surroundings for a natural listening experience
- Up to 8 hours of listening time and up to 24 hours with charging case
- 5-minute Fast Fuel charging gives you up to 1 hour of playback
- Built-in microphones give high-quality call performance and voice assistant interaction
- Three types of ear tips to choose from for improved comfort and sound quality
- Beats Studio Buds wireless earphones are compatible with iOS and Android devices
- They have a simple one-touch quick pair feature for Apple and Android phones*
- The earbuds support "Hey Siri" for instant access to the voice assistant on an iPhone
- The Beats App on Android handles settings and updates and shows the battery life
- For Apple devices, the same features are built into iOS with no app required

name: Beats Fit Pro
longDescription:
Dynamic Active Noise Cancellation
Integrated Apple H1 Chip
Flexible Secure-Fit Wingtips
IPX4 Sweat & Water Resistance
Up to 6 Hours of Playback with ANC
Charging Case with 18 Extra Hours
Transparency Mode Lets Outside Noise In
Accelerometer Can Detect When You Speak
Dual Beamforming Mics for Clear Calls
Class 1 Bluetooth for Longer Range

name: HUAWEI FreeBuds 5i
shortDescription: High Resolution Sound, 42 dB Multi-mode ANC, 28H of Music Playback
longDescription:
High Resolution Sound
42 dB Multi-mode ANC
28h of Music Playback
Compact and Comfortable
All-Purpose Interconnections

Battery capacity
Per earbud: 55 mAh (min)
Charging case: 410 mAh (min)

Playtime
Music playback on 1 charge: 6.0 hours (with ANC enabled)
Music playback on 1 charge: 7.5 hours (with ANC disabled)
Music playback with charging case: 18.5 hours (with ANC enabled)
Music playback with charging case: 28 hours (with ANC disabled)

Charging Time
About 60 minutes for the earbuds (in the charging case)
About 110 for charging case without earbuds (wired)

Connectivity
Bluetooth Compatibility:
BT 5.2

Pop-Up Pair:
Supported

Sensor
Hall sensor/Cap sensor

Driver
10 mm dynamic driver

Audio Technology
Active noise cancellation, Call noise cancellation, Transparency mode
